

 UPDATE SIABFACIL.FAMILIA_LOG A SET DATA_DESATIVACAO = F.DATA_DESATIVACAO
FROM SIABFACIL.FAMILIA_LOG B
INNER JOIN SIABFACIL.FAMILIA F ON F.ID = B.FAMILIA_ID
WHERE A.FAMILIA_ID IN (48804,
48736,
50438,
51694,
53033,
51753,

51515,

50275,

48869,
48681,

51261,
48727,
48827,
50356,
48796,
51135,
50357,

50714,

50440,
48782,
51695,
51051,
48757,
52870,
48746,
48786,

50200,
51414,
48708,
51060,

51279,
52183,
48694,
50192,

48828,

50500,
50342,
48667,
48792,

51339,
51228,
52998,
53175,
52873,

52143,
53285,
51391,
49181
) AND A.ID = B.ID
AND A.PROF_ID = '0000032505465851'
